revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=ClockworkPi |model=Core |revision=R-01 (RPi-CM3) |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |price=29 |est_release_date=03/2022 |type=SoM |pwr_v=3.3 |cpu1_brand=Allwinner |cpu1_model=D1 |cpu1_cspeed=1.0 GHz |cpu1_cores=1 |fla1=0 |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ4G63EFR-RDC |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=RPi-CM3 style SoDIMM connector |eth_none=true }} {{TagLine|ClockworkPi Core R-0}} :[https://www.clockworkpi.com/product-page/copy-of-clockworkpi-core-r-01 Product page]
"clockwork", "CORE" and "R-01" are silkscreened on module top. :Pin compatible with [[Raspberry Pi Compute Module 3 Lite]]
===Links=== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2022/03/16/devterm-modular-linux-terminal-risc-v-module-raspberry-pi-cm3/ ''DevTerm modular Linux terminal gets a RISC-V module'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/allwinner-d1-risc-v-soc-shows-up-on-new-nezha-stu-dev-kit-and-devterm-handheld/ ''Allwinner D1 RISC-V SoC shows up'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://linux-sunxi.org/ClockworkPi_R01 ''ClockworkPi R01'' on '''Linux-Sunxi''' Wiki]
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Allwinner]] D1 @1.0GHz :Single-core ''XuanTie'' C906 ([https://occ.t-head.cn/vendor/cpu/index?id=3817197695983423488 RISC-V]) *Memory: 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM @792MHz *Power Source: 3.3V via SoDIMM connector pins
===See also=== *[[ClockworkPi Core R-01]] *[[ClockworkPi DevTerm Kit R-01]] *[[ClockworkPi uConsole Kit R-01]] *[[ClockworkPi Core A-04]] *[[ClockworkPi DevTerm Kit A-04]] *[[ClockworkPi uConsole Kit A-04]] *[[ClockworkPi Core A-06]] *[[ClockworkPi DevTerm Kit A-06]] *[[ClockworkPi uConsole Kit A-06]]
